title.narrative: Communication Toolkit for the Middle East and North Africa Regional Office
Trousse d'outils de communication du Bureau régional du Moyen-Orient et de l'Afrique du Nord

description.narrative:
To contribute to IDRC's mandate of initiating, encouraging, supporting, and sharing development research, the Regional Office for the Middle East and North Africa plans to develop a communication kit. This tool will be distributed during regional tours, at regional and international conferences and exhibitions, workshops, and other venues.
The kit meets IDRC's Corporate Communications Strategy objectives by informing target audiences about IDRC's mandate and accomplishments. Specifically, it targets the following audiences in the Middle East and North Africa: -researchers (past, current, and potential) -policymakers -donors -NGOs -media
The kit will include the following items: -regional office brochure in Arabic, English, and French; -regional office multimedia presentation in Arabic, English, and French; and, -success stories.
Other items may be added to the kit over time. The communications tools will help: -increase the visibility of IDRC in the region; -increase the awareness of researchers, policymakers, and NGOs regarding IDRC's activities; and, -increase the number of research proposals from the region.
